p: This study included 7283 SARI influenza-negative respiratory samples from hospitalized and deceased patients for the diagnosis of other respiratory viruses. These samples were processed by qualitative multiplex RT-PCR for the simultaneous detection of nucleic acids from 14 respiratory viruses (xTAG ® RVP FAST v2 with the universal classification system of Luminex Molecular Diagnostics on Luminex ® Platforms LX100 / 200) between April 2009 and December 2018.
